com.epoch.synthesis

Class SingleRxnSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.synthesis.SingleRxnSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchConstants, StereoConstants

    class SingleRxnSolver
extends Object
implements SearchConstants, StereoConstants
    Calculates the products of a single reaction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean allowDimerization
      Whether to allow substrates to react with themselves.
      private SynthSolver caller
      The caller instance that created this instance.
      private int desiredNumSubstrates
      The number of substrates required by the reaction.
      private int generatedSMStereo
      Whether the enantiomer of an enantiopure starting material was produced by the reaction, and if so, whether the starting material was part of the initial array of substrates or a reaction product.
      private Molecule[] initArray
      Substrates submitted by user.
      private boolean isAsymmetric
      Whether the reaction produces just one enantiomer.
      private boolean isDielsAlder
      Whether the reaction is a Diels-Alder reaction.
      private boolean keepPermuting
      Whether to look for products of B + A after A + B has produced a product.
      private String majorOrMinor
      Describes a product as major or minor, as in exo Diels-Alder.
      private String majorOrMinorExplan
      Describes how or why a product is major or minor.
      private Molecule moleculeOfRxn
      MRV reaction definition imported into a molecule.
      private Reactor reactor
      JChem's reaction calculator.
      private int restartedAlready
      The number of times the calculations were restarted because the enantiomer of an enantiopure starting material was produced in the reaction, and we had to restart the calculations with racemic starting material.
      private List<Molecule> rxnProducts
      List of calculated products.

      Add products from Reactor to the list of products of this reaction loop, unless the products are already among prior reaction products (prevents redundancy) or among the initial substrates (prevents degenerate products from being listed).

        private transient int generatedSMStereo
        Whether the enantiomer of an enantiopure starting material was produced by the reaction, and if so, whether the starting material was part of the initial array of substrates or a reaction product.

      • restartedAlready

        private transient int restartedAlready
        The number of times the calculations were restarted because the enantiomer of an enantiopure starting material was produced in the reaction, and we had to restart the calculations with racemic starting material.

        private transient boolean isDielsAlder
        Whether the reaction is a Diels-Alder reaction.

        private transient Molecule[] initArray
        Substrates submitted by user. Value obtained from caller.

        List of calculated products. Value obtained from caller.

    • Method Detail

      • calcProducts

        boolean calcProducts(String singleRxnDef)
              throws SynthError
        Calculates the products of a reaction.
        Parameters:
        singleRxnDef - MRV of the reaction definition
        Returns:
        true if products were obtained, false if not
        Throws:
        SynthError - if products (or lack thereof) could not be calculated

      • getSearchOptions

        private String getSearchOptions()
        Gets parameters that need to be set for syn-anti double bond stereochemistry to work.
        Returns:
        a string setting the reactor parameters

      • wrongNumSubstrates

        private boolean wrongNumSubstrates()
        Find if the reaction disallows wrong number of substrates and, if so, if the wrong number has been submitted.
        Returns:
        true if the wrong number of substrates has been submitted

      • doOneRxnLoop

        private List<Molecule> doOneRxnLoop(int loopCt)
                             throws ReactionException
        Finds one set of substrates that, when submitted to Reactor, generates products. Adds properties to the products.
        Parameters:
        loopCt - how many times the substrates have been subjected to this reaction
        Returns:
        products as a list of molecules
        Throws:
        ReactionException - if the reaction products can't be calculated

      • submitResizedArray

        private void submitResizedArray(Molecule[] resizedArray,
                                List<Molecule> thisRxnLoopProducts,
                                int numPriorRxnProds,
                                int rxnProdIdx,
                                int lenSubstArray)
                         throws ReactionException
        Submits permutations of an array of substrates of the right size to the reactor, and adds the products to the growing list.
        Parameters:
        resizedArray - an array of substrates of the right size
        thisRxnLoopProducts - growing list of reaction products
        numPriorRxnProds - number of reaction products before entering this reaction loop
        rxnProdIdx - index of one of the prior reaction products that may have been substituted into the array of substrates now being submitted to the reactor
        lenSubstArray - the original number of substrates before resizing the array
        Throws:
        ReactionException - if the reaction products can't be calculated

      • substratesLackFnalGroup

        private boolean substratesLackFnalGroup(List<Molecule> substList)
        Determines whether the functional groups required by this reaction are present. Any set of reaction conditions could involve many different kinds of functional groups. Before calling Reactor, see if the reactants contain the functional groups required for this particular reaction definition -- should save time.
        Parameters:
        substList - list of substrates for the reaction
        Returns:
        true if substrates contain all the functional groups

      • substratesLackFnalGroup

        private boolean substratesLackFnalGroup(Molecule[] substArray)
        Determines whether the functional groups required by this reaction are present. Any set of reaction conditions could involve many different kinds of functional groups. Before calling Reactor, see if the reactants contain the functional groups required for this particular reaction definition -- should save time.
        Parameters:
        substArray - array of substrates for the reaction
        Returns:
        true if substrates contain all the functional groups

      • getGroupNameNumber

        private String[] getGroupNameNumber(String grpLoc)
        Gets a functional group's name.
        Parameters:
        grpLoc - ID number or name of the functional group
        Returns:
        array of Strings: first is the name, second is the ID number

      • substratesWithFnalGroup

        private int[] substratesWithFnalGroup(Molecule[] substArray,
                                      String[] grpNameNum)
        Determines whether the functional groups required by this reaction are present. Any set of reaction conditions could involve many different kinds of functional groups. Before calling Reactor, see if the reactants contain the functional groups required for this particular reaction definition -- should save time.
        Parameters:
        substArray - array of substrates for the reaction
        grpNameNum - name and group number of functional group
        Returns:
        indices of substrates containing the functional group

      • getResizedArrays

        private List<Molecule[]> getResizedArrays(Molecule[] substArray)
        If number of submitted substrates not the number needed, duplicate or remove substrates in all combinations, making new arrays.
        Parameters:
        substArray - array of substrates
        Returns:
        list of molecule arrays, each with the right number of substrates, formed by removing or duplicating members of substArray

      • changeMultiSubstrateNums

        private void changeMultiSubstrateNums(List<int[]> substrateNums,
                                      boolean add)
        Change the number of substrates in a list to match the number needed for the reaction.
        Parameters:
        substrateNums - list of int arrays, each member of which is a number corresponding to each substrate
        add - whether to add or remove substrates

      • changeOneSubstrateNum

        private List<int[]> changeOneSubstrateNum(int[] substrateNums,
                                          boolean add)
        Change the number of substrates in a list to approach the number needed for the reaction.
        Parameters:
        substrateNums - list of int arrays, each member of which is a number corresponding to each substrate
        add - whether to add or remove substrates
        Returns:
        list of int arrays, each member of which is a number corresponding to each substrate

      • implicitizeHAtoms

        private void implicitizeHAtoms(Molecule[] calcdProds)
        Implicitizes H atoms of calculated products except those required to indicate stereochemistry.
        Parameters:
        calcdProds - array of calculated products

      • convert0DTo2D

        private void convert0DTo2D(Molecule... cpds)
        Gives 2D coordinates to zero-dimensional Reactor products.
        Parameters:
        cpds - array of compounds

      • addToRxnLoopProducts

        private void addToRxnLoopProducts(Molecule[] reactorProds,
                                  List<Molecule> thisRxnLoopProducts)
        Add products from Reactor to the list of products of this reaction loop, unless the products are already among prior reaction products (prevents redundancy) or among the initial substrates (prevents degenerate products from being listed).
        Parameters:
        reactorProds - array of reaction products from one reactor call
        thisRxnLoopProducts - list of reaction products of this loop

      • updateRxnProducts

        private void updateRxnProducts(List<Molecule> rxnProducts,
                               List<Molecule> thisRxnLoopProducts)
        Remove reacted rxn products from rxnProducts, add products from this loop.
        Parameters:
        rxnProducts - list of all reaction products thus far
        thisRxnLoopProducts - list of reaction products of this loop

      • found

        private boolean found(int index)
        Gets if a molecule has been found in an array or list.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the molecule in the array or list
        Returns:
        true if the index ≥ 0
